doc:
Luis Barbero https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luis_Barbero 0 Luis Barbero Fernández (8 August 1916 – 3 August 2005) was a Spanish actor. He appeared in more than 150 films and television shows between 1957 and 2001. In 2000, he was awarded with a Lifetime Achievement Award from the Spanish Actors Union. He died of a heart attack in 2005. Luis_Barbero_Fernández ( 8_August_1916 – 3_August_2005 ) was a_Spanish_actor . He appeared in more_than_150_films_and_television_shows between 1957_and_2001 . In 2000 , he was_awarded with a_Lifetime_Achievement_Award from the_Spanish_Actors_Union . He died of a_heart_attack in 2005 .
